description: Mobile Lead is the only resource with React Native expertise. If TASK-MOB-001 fails or is delayed, no backup exists.
mitigation_strategy: Pull mobile prototyping into Sprint 2. Pair Backend Lead with Mobile Lead on WebSocket integration.
contingency_plan: Engage React Native contractor for 2 weeks in Sprint 3.

description: Security Architect utilization is >80% in Sprint 1 with high complexity tasks (B2C XML).
mitigation_strategy: Defer non-critical auth features (e.g., social login) to Sprint 2/3. Use B2C starter pack.
contingency_plan: Backend Lead assists with JWT strategy implementation earlier.
